title: Sell Screaming Eagle
metaTitle: Sell Screaming Eagle Wine | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Screaming Eagle wine. We buy the Cabernet Sauvignon and Sauvignon Blanc from this Napa Valley cult icon. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Screaming Eagle Cabernet Sauvignon and Sauvignon Blanc.
introParagraph: Screaming Eagle is the quintessential Napa Valley cult wine. With tiny production and a massive waitlist, it is one of the most liquid assets in the wine world. We purchase all vintages of the flagship Cabernet Sauvignon, the Second Flight (now The Flight), and the incredibly rare Sauvignon Blanc.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Counterfeit bottles (we verify against known anti-fraud markers)
photoChecklist: Bubble code (if present on newer vintages)
pricingFactors: Sauvignon Blanc rarity (prices are extremely high)

faqs.question: Is Screaming Eagle Sauvignon Blanc valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is often the most expensive Sauvignon Blanc in the world due to its scarcity.

faqs.question: What is The Flight?
faqs.answer: It is the second wine of the estate, focusing more on Merlot. It is also highly valuable.

faqs.question: Do I need the original wooden box?
faqs.answer: While not strictly required, the OWC (Original Wood Case) significantly helps value and provenance.

faqs.question: What is the 1992 vintage worth?
faqs.answer: The inaugural 1992 vintage is a perfect 100-point wine and commands a massive premium.

faqs.question: How do you verify authenticity?
faqs.answer: We check the unique bubble codes on newer bottles and specific glass/label markers on older ones.
